name: CoyPu — Event Extraction & Mapping
problem: Detect & extract critical events from text and visualize them geospatially for decision support.
approach: Transformer-based event detection and extraction (BERT/RoBERTa), entity normalization, and a web app to map events by location and criticality.
impact: Improved situational awareness and information access for stakeholders.

name: PEM — Energy Forecasting
problem: Forecast per-machine and overall energy consumption for industrial optimization.
approach: Time-series models (GRU/FFN), feature engineering, and REST APIs for integration.
impact: Reduced energy cost variance; enabled proactive maintenance decisions.

name: DigitalCurri — Curriculum Digitization
problem: Digitize legacy curriculum content and make it searchable for faculty and students.
approach: ETL pipeline, OCR, metadata tagging, and search UI.
impact: Faster curriculum planning and content discovery.
